opencache.controller.request.opencachefloodlight module¶

opencachefloodlight.py - Sends JSON-RPC commands to the Floodlight controller.

class opencache.controller.request.opencachefloodlight.Request(controller, config)[source]¶
add_redirect(expr, node_host, node_port, openflow_host, openflow_port, switch_dpid, vlan_id)[source]¶

Add a redirect for content requests matching given expression to given node.
